about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: My name is Immanuel Ardiyanto, at this time I'm studying at President University. I am an IT practitioner whose have interests in Artificial Intelligent, Website Development, Software Engineer, and Web3. I am a fast-learner, analyst, and critical-thinker person.

project.title: All Works

project.project3: An Image Processing Application created to apply enhancement, filtering, etc on an image.
project.project4: A Renting Book System created to manage data and managing the renting time limit.
project.project5: A BMI Calculator Application created to calculate user's BMI along with log in system
